channel.title: Could someone please help me,
channel.description: well atm i got a server with a few players, i used to host on a friends pc but i can't anymore and i cannot host on my own computer anymore because i got a modem. without a router builded in. so i need to buy a vps. problem is i dont know anything about vps. whats a good site to buy from how to set it up and i dont know my friends computer system beside of it's a windows, and i think its x86. could any1 help me out ? please really need it

item.title: Could someone please help me,
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“1 2 3 4 KOED, post:3, topic:519838”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=638330.msg4302498#msg4302498 date=1369221494]
Hey there,

An VPS (virtual private server) is like a computer which you can open up on your own computer.
This ‘computer’ is always (except if your hosters stops it) online. Now this is quite expensive for some people
since you buy a good vps for like 15$ a month. If you gain more players then i suggest you use a better vps (like 30-40$)
so it is better secured by DDOSER’s and can hold more players.

Now there are tons of guides on how to setup an VPS and with google you should find it in no time.
For good vps hosting sites I should also just search on mopar since you are not the first one with this question.

[/quote] You can never fully protect from DDoS attacks.[/quote]

If you would read my post more carefully you will notice that i said: it is better secured by DDOSER’s

Still dont see it?
One sec i will type slowly: b e t t e r

Read full topic

item.title: Could someone please help me,
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

Im using trentahost, i personally like it and think its good if you want me to guide buying off trentahost or need info then pm or sumfin id be glad to help m8.

item.title: Could someone please help me,

item.description:

whats a good place to buy the vps from? and should it could anything special for work with a rsps, because many of the vps says like domain name ----- .com
so i guesse thats for forums but once again i dont know alot about it

An VPS (virtual private server) is like a computer which you can open up on your own computer.
This ‘computer’ is always (except if your hosters stops it) online. Now this is quite expensive for some people
since you buy a good vps for like 15$ a month. If you gain more players then i suggest you use a better vps (like 30-40$)
so it is better secured by DDOSER’s and can hold more players.

Now there are tons of guides on how to setup an VPS and with google you should find it in no time.

item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Hey there,

An VPS (virtual private server) is like a computer which you can open up on your own computer.
This ‘computer’ is always (except if your hosters stops it) online. Now this is quite expensive for some people
since you buy a good vps for like 15$ a month. If you gain more players then i suggest you use a better vps (like 30-40$)
so it is better secured by DDOSER’s and can hold more players.

Now there are tons of guides on how to setup an VPS and with google you should find it in no time.
For good vps hosting sites I should also just search on mopar since you are not the first one with this question.
